item.title: Android CircleCI Configuration
item.description: CircleCI Android Yapılandırması .circleci/config.yml version: 2 jobs: build: working_directory: ~/code docker: - image: circleci/android:api-28-alpha environment: JVM_OPTS: -Xmx3200m steps: - checkout - run: name: Initialize Keystore File command: echo $KEYSTORE_BASE64 | base64 --decode > app/aykutasilkeystore - run: name: Initialize Fabric Properties command: | echo "apiKey=$FABRIC_API_KEY" >> app/fabric.properties echo "apiSecret=$FABRIC_API_SECRET" >> app/fabric.properties cat app/fabric.properties - run: name: Initialize Keystore File command: | echo "signingKeyAlias=$KEYSTORE_KEY_ALIAS" >> keystore.properties echo "signingKeyAliasPassword=$KEYSTORE_KEY_ALIAS_PASSWORD" >> keystore.properties echo "signingStoreFile=$KEYSTORE_STORE_FILE" >> keystore.
